    Registration broker that validates or revokes client certificates through blockchain

        Creates a registration record on blockchain validating a client certificate
        Parameters:
        certificateAddress - an address respresenting a client certificate
        metadata - a metadata marshallable to byte[] to be embedded with registration record

        registration record locator

        IOException - when network failure occurs
